TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MobileTypeNameConverter extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationConverterBase
Public NotInheritable Class MobileTypeNameConverter Inherits ConfigurationConverterBase

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 将对象的值转换为不同的数据类型。

span.span: Converts the value of an object into a different data type.
This class cannot be inherited.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 越泛型类不会查找中移动的程序集的类型名称。The more generic class does not look up the type names in the mobile assembly. 因此，类创建以启用移动相关的命名空间中的类型名称转换。Therefore, the class was created to enable type-name conversion in the mobile-related namespaces.
